page.title: 10Stanton-u-Bardon Post Office
page.content: The{General Food Store and Post {Office}in the village was a house when it was{first built in 1890.}It was opened as a{food store}by Mr.Brown in {1952.}When Mr.Brown retired Mr.Cooper took over the shop and later he also took the things out of the old post office, just down the road.Now it is the Maid Marion Food Store and Post Office. The shop opens at 9.00am.and closes at 5.30pm.most days, with half day closing at on Wednesdays at 1.00pm. They sell more than{1000}things in the shop including medicines,washing powder,cooked meats,cakes,frozen food,tinned goods,sweets,cards and drinks as well all the services of the Post Office.The busiest day of the week is Thursday.
